attributes.action: We need to take down the Pyramids as they were built by slave labour
attributes.additional_details: Because I have faith in government
attributes.background: Bring about international pressure on Egypt to take the pyramids of oppression down

rejection.details:
The construction or demolition of the Egyptian Pyramids is a matter for the Egyptian Government, not the UK Parliament.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to work with the international community to review world heritage sites built with slave labour e.g. pyramids, if that is something you'd like to happen.
